mdRecord.dcterms:title: Family Correspondence and Personal Letter from Father-in-Law T. G. Shelor at Snowville
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Family correspondence, personal letter dated July 20, 1861, to “Dear Doctor” from Father-in-Law T. G. Shelor at Snowville, 2 original pieces – letter and envelope.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Records and correspondence
mdRecord.dcterms:provenance: Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University. University Libraries
